title: Elven Crystal Chest

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Elven Crystal Chest is a chest found in the upper level of the Tower of Voices in Prifddinas. It can be opened with an enhanced crystal key, and gives better average loot than the crystal chest in Taverley.

content:
Elven Crystal Chest
Released25 July 2019 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationTower of Voices, upper level
OptionsOpen, Check
ExamineI wonder what's inside.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID36582

The Elven Crystal Chest is a chest found in the upper level of the Tower of Voices in Prifddinas. It can be opened with an enhanced crystal key, and gives better average loot than the crystal chest in Taverley.

Contents

    • 1.1 Possibility 1 - Uncut onyx
    • 1.2 Possibility 2 - Dragonstone armour

    • 1.9 Possibility 9 - Runes
    • 1.10 Possibility 10 - Yew seed
    • 1.11 Possibility 11 - Raw sharks
    • 1.12 Possibility 12 - Gold ores
    • 1.13 Possibility 13 - Runite ores
    • 1.14 Possibility 14 - Crystal acorn
    • 1.15 Possibility 15 - Dragon items

Rewards possibilities[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 2,915,277 openings from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Elven Crystal Chest opening is worth 56,352.24.

This does not include the value of the expected ~2.8 Crystal shards per chest or the small chance to receive a Crystal acorn
